column1: Uchi////This is a place to see and be seen
column2: very trendy inside and you are paying for the ambiance and the quality of the food. If you are hungry and like a lot of food
column3: but don't want to spend a fortune
column4: this is NOT recommended. The quality is superb and the presentation is art on your plate
column5: but the portions are small. I personally
column6: enjoy paying a little less for a lot more food with still decent quality
